attributes.action: Legalise cannabis both medicinally and recreationally
attributes.additional_details:
Positives v negatives:
Negatives:
.It blocks memory formation.
.THC messes with your balance (so does alcohol yet its legal)
.cannabis can cause depression
.can cause anxiety 
.can cause psychosis
Positives:
.it makes us feel good and is still healthier than cigarettes AND alcohol
.controls epileptic seizures (Billy Caldwell is enough evidence here)
.Treats inflammatory bowel diseases
.slows progression of Alzheimers
.Stops cancer from spreading
.it would create more jobs
.ect ect....
attributes.background: Im just going to get straight to the point- its about time it gets legalised, let us grow our own plants so we know that our cannabis is pure, let us buy it from licensed shops and also legalise it medicinally, it can cause harm to humans but so can cigarettes +alc. yet they are legal! Why not weed?
